data.fullContent: After working as a practicing medical professional for three years, Dr. Williams decided to switch careers and go into teaching. He knew it would be hard to get his foot in the door, but he believed his interpersonal and communication skills would be the right fit for the job. He took some time off and spent it getting ready for the task. He worked on his resume, gave lectures at a community center in a nearby town to learn how to work in front of a crowd, and even took a course on public speaking. It was time-consuming, but two years later, he finally got a job in a university as an assistant professor of medicine.

q1.translation: 当了三年后，威廉姆斯医生决定转行从事教学工作。他知道自己很难进入这家公司，但他相信自己的人际交往和沟通能力将是这份工作的合适人选。
q1.front: After working as a practicing medical professional for three years, Dr. Williams decided to switch careers and go into teaching. He knew it would be hard to get his foot in the door, but he believed his interpersonal and communication skills would be the right fit for the job.
q1.content: After working as a practicing medical professional for three ____, Dr. Williams ____ to switch careers and ____ into teaching. He knew it would be hard to ____ his foot in the door, but ____ believed his interpersonal and communication skills would ____ the right ____ for the job.

q2.translation: 当了三年后，威廉姆斯医生决定转行从事教学工作。他知道自己很难进入这家公司，但他相信自己的人际交往和沟通能力将是这份工作的合适人选。他休息了一段时间，用来准备这项任务。他写简历，在附近城镇的社区中心演讲，学习如何在人群面前工作，甚至还参加了一门公共演讲课程。虽然花了很多时间，但两年后，他终于在一所大学找到了一份医学助理教授的工作。
q2.front: After working as a practicing medical professional for three years, Dr. Williams decided to switch careers and go into teaching. He knew it would be hard to get his foot in the door, but he believed his interpersonal and communication skills would be the right fit for the job.
q2.middle: He took some time off and spent it getting ready for the task.
q2.ending: He worked on his resume, gave lectures at a community center in a nearby town to learn how to work in front of a crowd, and even took a course on public speaking. It was time-consuming, but two years later, he finally got a job in a university as an assistant professor of medicine.

options.sentence: Now he is not a surgeon anymore because he is learning how to teach.
Even if he was tired, he knew he had to be ready for his next shift.
He took some time off and spent it getting ready for the task.
He was surprised because he had just replaced it that morning.

options.sentence: Dr. Williams worked as a practicing medical professional for three years before deciding to switch careers and become a teacher.
Dr. Williams did not want to be a professor and did not have any specific career goals when he decided to become a teacher.
Dr. Williams had worked in the emergency room for many years before becoming a surgeon, so being a surgeon was not new to him.
Dr. Williams was unhappy when he was moved to a community clinic instead of working at a hospital full-time.
